attributes.title: i should get money for pain & suffering
attributes.review: literally fried my phone, my brain cells, my patience. my phone was not the same after downloading this app. i am not the same. this app is a scam & needs to be deleted

attributes.title: Not worth it
attributes.review: Don’t waste time downloading this app for its actual use. Just download it so you can leave a bad rating.

attributes.title: Is it really worth it downloading this app
attributes.review: Like is it it really worth it downloading this app like it takes all your info and then stalks you maybe so just doing this for good warning ⚠️⚠️

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: alright so i just opened the app and an ad of a skinny fan popped up and i was in shock! 😌this is not the way to go if trump wants to be good influencer. also another ad popped up and it was about trump being a sex offender. 😷😷😷and it’s true so imma say bye😘😘😘😘🤩🤩🤩

attributes.title: Pure Trash
attributes.review: This app breeds racism and hate. I hope apps like these will not be around much longer

attributes.title: Here we go again
attributes.review: I tried to open this app and my phone literally got covered in cat dung. I DONT EVEN HAVE A CAT! I’m not sure what the devs are doing but something about the main character in this game seems off. They called him Drumpf or Tiny Hands, wait I think his villain name was Bunker Boy, I cant remember. Something about white power and killing 125k people. Please do not share with your friends, this app has made my phone all stinky and poopy.

attributes.title: i can’t
attributes.review: this is the worst app ever. i showed it to my two female cats and they immediately started humping my toaster oven. it was exactly 4:20 at the time and my father who i haven’t seen in 17 years came into the kitchen and started singing call me maybe while doing the renegade. i am completely disgusted by this app and what it is doing to my phone. ever since i downloaded it it keeps opening the netflix app and playing sophia the first. i have tried deleting it but it has broken my phone. i am writing this review from my post-humped toaster oven. please do not download this i beg of you if you do not want to accidentally waste $69,696,969 trying to fix your phone while talking with an indian guy named chad. i found out only after my deceased grandfather came back to life and told me to not trust chads and that trump was tricking me into giving him money. thanks for reading.
